title: def localSortFunction(a: Person, b: Person) = a.age < b.age val people = valid.sort(localSortFunction _) var ret: List[String] = Nil

ret.toList Turn your mutable data structures into immutable data structures. def validByAge(in: List[Person]): List[String] = val valid = for (p<- in if p.valid) yield p def localSortFunction(a: Person,b:Person) = a.age < b.age val people = valid.sort(localSortFunction _) for(p<- people) yield p.first Make your method into a single statement
